snippet: Darren Woods, the new CEO of Exxon Mobil, is a veteran of the more cautious refining side of the oil business who is likely to focus relentlessly on controlling costs....

headline.main: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels

lead_paragraph: Darren Woods, the new CEO of Exxon Mobil, is a veteran of the more cautious refining side of the oil business who is likely to focus relentlessly on controlling costs.
